name: clear
title: clear the terminal screen
description: clear clears your screen if this is possible, including its scrollback buffer (if the extended "E3" capability is defined).

sections.title: NAME
codeBlocks:
tput(1), terminfo(5)

       This describes ncurses version 5.7 (patch 20081102).

								      clear(1)
